title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, November 27, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of Swedish astronomer Anders Celsius, (1701) who invented the Celsius temperature scale.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Swedish astronomer Anders Celsius, (1701) who invented the Celsius temperature scale.
